original_text: Notwithstanding the land shall be desolate because of them that dwell therein, for the fruit of their doings.
korean_text: 그 땅은 그 주민의 행위의 열매로 말미암아 황폐하리로다

sentences.original_text: Notwithstanding the land shall be desolate
because of them that dwell therein
for the fruit of their doings
